name: Niaw de Leon
text: Maybe it's fair to judge just that one aspect of the person. In other words, you have a reasonable measure of their credibility. But it doesn't mean they're automatically bad at other things. Maybe they're kind. Maybe they're good at cooking. Just not  that sharp when it comes to evaluating information. Also, people change.  They may yet learn to be more critical in the future.

source_obj.text: Maybe it's fair to judge just that one aspect of the person. In other words, you have a reasonable measure of their credibility. They may yet learn to be more critical in the future.
